metadata.title: CVE-2017-5668 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: bitlbee-libpurple before 3.5.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (NULL pointer dereference and crash) and possibly execute arbitrarycode via a file transfer request for a contact that is not in the contactlist.  NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix forCVE-2016-10189.

criterions.comment: bitlbee: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
